summary: Defines a specialized admin class for geographic Django models that replaces standard form fields with interactive map widgets, supports configurable map options such as center, zoom and layers, and automatically injects the required OpenLayers JavaScript and CSS resources into the admin interface.
business_intent: Enable developers to manage and edit spatial data directly from the Django admin using configurable, mapâ€‘based widgets, simplifying GIS data administration and reducing the need for custom map integration code.
